languages.text: Во время боевых действий на планете было получено подтверждение того, о чем уже догадывались и сам{mf||а} благословенн{mf|ый|ая} Лорд-капитан, и {mf|его|ее} спутники: за бунтовщиками стояли куда более страшные враги Человечества. Несколько раз среди сражающейся черни были отмечены создания, распознанные как поганые {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносы{/g}-эльдары. "Помощница" Вистенцы Вьятт, выдававшая себя за мутанта, не была единственной на Янусе: разведка подтвердила наличие иных представителей этой расы на агромире.

traits.locale_text: Во время боевых действий на планете было получено подтверждение того, о чем уже догадывались и сам{mf||а} благословенн{mf|ый|ая} Лорд-капитан, и {mf|его|ее} спутники: за бунтовщиками стояли куда более страшные враги Человечества. Несколько раз среди сражающейся черни были отмечены создания, распознанные как поганые ксеносы-эльдары. "Помощница" Вистенцы Вьятт, выдававшая себя за мутанта, не была единственной на Янусе: разведка подтвердила наличие иных представителей этой расы на агромире.

languages.text: During the operations on the planet, the suspicions of the blessed Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} companions were confirmed: the rebels were being manipulated by even more terrible enemies of Humanity. Creatures identified as filthy {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} — Aeldari, to be precise — were seen fighting alongside the peasants. Vistenza Vyatt's so-called aide, who had claimed to be a mutant, was not the only one of her kind on Janus: scouts confirmed the presence of other members of this race on the agri-world.
languages.original_text: Во время боевых действий на планете было получено подтверждение того, о чем уже догадывались и сам{mf||а} благословенн{mf|ый|ая} Лорд-капитан, и {mf|его|ее} спутники: за бунтовщиками стояли куда более страшные враги Человечества. Несколько раз среди сражающейся черни были отмечены создания, распознанные как поганые {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносы{/g}-эльдары. "Помощница" Вистенцы Вьятт, выдававшая себя за мутанта, не была единственной на Янусе: разведка подтвердила наличие иных представителей этой расы на агромире.

traits.locale_text: During the operations on the planet, the suspicions of the blessed Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} companions were confirmed: the rebels were being manipulated by even more terrible enemies of Humanity. Creatures identified as filthy xenos — Aeldari, to be precise — were seen fighting alongside the peasants. Vistenza Vyatt's so-called aide, who had claimed to be a mutant, was not the only one of her kind on Janus: scouts confirmed the presence of other members of this race on the agri-world.

Creatures identified as filthy xenos — Aeldari, to be precise — were seen fighting alongside the peasants. Vistenza Vyatt's so-called aide, who had claimed to be a mutant, was not the only one of her kind on Janus: scouts confirmed the presence of other members of this race on the agri-world.

During the operations on the planet, the suspicions of the blessed Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} companions were confirmed: the rebels were being manipulated by even more terrible enemies of Humanity. Creatures identified as filthy xenos — Aeldari, to be precise — were seen fighting alongside the peasants. Vistenza Vyatt's so-called aide, who had claimed to be a mutant, was not the only one of her kind on Janus: scouts confirmed the presence of other members of this race on the agri-world.

During the operations on the planet, the suspicions of the blessed Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} companions were confirmed: the rebels were being manipulated by even more terrible enemies of Humanity. Creatures identified as filthy {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} — Aeldari, to be precise — were seen fighting alongside the peasants. Vistenza Vyatt's so-called aide, who had claimed to be a mutant, was not the only one of her kind on Janus: scouts confirmed the presence of other members of this race on the agri-world.

languages.text: この惑星での作戦中、祝福受けしロード・キャプテンとその一行が抱いていた疑念は確信になった。反乱軍は、はるかに恐ろしい人類の敵によって扇動されていたのだ。卑劣な{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}—正確にはアエルダリであることが判明した生物は農民側について戦っていた。ヴィステンツァ・ビャットの側近とやらは、自らを変異体と称しており、ヤヌスには他にも同種の変異体がいた。このように農業惑星に変異体種族が他にも存在しているのを、斥候部隊が確認している。
languages.original_text: During the operations on the planet, the suspicions of the blessed Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} companions were confirmed: the rebels were being manipulated by even more terrible enemies of Humanity. Creatures identified as filthy {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} — Aeldari, to be precise — were seen fighting alongside the peasants. Vistenza Vyatt's so-called aide, who had claimed to be a mutant, was not the only one of her kind on Janus: scouts confirmed the presence of other members of this race on the agri-world.

traits.locale_text: この惑星での作戦中、祝福受けしロード・キャプテンとその一行が抱いていた疑念は確信になった。反乱軍は、はるかに恐ろしい人類の敵によって扇動されていたのだ。卑劣な{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}—正確にはアエルダリであることが判明した生物は農民側について戦っていた。ヴィステンツァ・ビャットの側近とやらは、自らを変異体と称しており、ヤヌスには他にも同種の変異体がいた。このように農業惑星に変異体種族が他にも存在しているのを、斥候部隊が確認している。

languages.text: 在这颗行星的军事行动期间，受神皇保佑的舰长大人与{mf|他|她}的同伴们的怀疑得到了证实：叛军受到了更加可怕的人类之敌的操纵。人们看到了邪恶的{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}与当地农奴并肩作战的情形，更确切地说，那些异形是艾达灵族。维丝坦萨·维亚特那位自称是变种人的助手，实际上并非加努斯唯一的异形。侦察兵的报告兵证实，这个农业世界上还有其他异形。
languages.original_text: During the operations on the planet, the suspicions of the blessed Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} companions were confirmed: the rebels were being manipulated by even more terrible enemies of Humanity. Creatures identified as filthy {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} — Aeldari, to be precise — were seen fighting alongside the peasants. Vistenza Vyatt's so-called aide, who had claimed to be a mutant, was not the only one of her kind on Janus: scouts confirmed the presence of other members of this race on the agri-world.

traits.locale_text: 在这颗行星的军事行动期间，受神皇保佑的舰长大人与{mf|他|她}的同伴们的怀疑得到了证实：叛军受到了更加可怕的人类之敌的操纵。人们看到了邪恶的{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}与当地农民并肩作战的情形，更确切地说，那些异形是艾达灵族。维丝坦萨·维亚特那位自称是变种人的助手，实际上并非加努斯唯一的异形。侦察兵的报告兵证实，这个农业世界上还有其他异形。

languages.text: Durante las operaciones llevadas a cabo en el planeta, las sospechas {mf|del bendito Lord Capitán|de la bendita Lord Capitán} y sus compañeros se vieron confirmadas: los rebeldes estaban siendo manipulados por enemigos aún peores de la Humanidad. Varias criaturas identificadas como viles {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} (Aeldari, para más señas) fueron divisadas luchando del lado de los campesinos. La supuesta ayudante de Vistenza Vyatt, que se había confesado mutante, no era la única de su ralea en Janus: nuestros exploradores confirmaron la presencia de otros miembros de su especie en el mundo agrícola.
languages.original_text: During the operations on the planet, the suspicions of the blessed Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} companions were confirmed: the rebels were being manipulated by even more terrible enemies of Humanity. Creatures identified as filthy {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} — Aeldari, to be precise — were seen fighting alongside the peasants. Vistenza Vyatt's so-called aide, who had claimed to be a mutant, was not the only one of her kind on Janus: scouts confirmed the presence of other members of this race on the agri-world.

traits.locale_text: Durante las operaciones llevadas a cabo en el planeta, las sospechas {mf|del bendito Lord Capitán|de la bendita Lord Capitán} y sus compañeros se vieron confirmadas: los rebeldes estaban siendo manipulados por enemigos aún peores de la Humanidad. Varias criaturas identificadas como viles {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} (Aeldari, para más señas) fueron divisadas luchando del lado de los campesinos. La supuesta ayudante de Vistenza Vyatt, que se había confesado mutante, no era la única de su ralea en Janus: nuestros exploradores confirmaron la presencia de otros miembros de su especie en el mundo agrícola.

languages.text: Während der Operationen auf dem Planeten bestätigte sich der Verdacht des gesegneten Lord Captain und {mf|seiner|ihrer} Gefährten: Die Rebellen wurden von noch schrecklicheren Feinden der Menschheit manipuliert. Als üble {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} identifizierte Kreaturen – Aeldari, um genau zu sein – wurden im Kampf an der Seite der Bauern gesichtet. Vistenza Vyatts sogenannte Gehilfin, die sich als Mutantin ausgegeben hatte, war nicht die Einzige ihrer Art auf Janus: Späher bestätigten die Präsenz weiterer Mitglieder dieser Spezies auf der Agrarwelt.
languages.original_text: During the operations on the planet, the suspicions of the blessed Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} companions were confirmed: the rebels were being manipulated by even more terrible enemies of Humanity. Creatures identified as filthy {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} — Aeldari, to be precise — were seen fighting alongside the peasants. Vistenza Vyatt's so-called aide, who had claimed to be a mutant, was not the only one of her kind on Janus: scouts confirmed the presence of other members of this race on the agri-world.

traits.locale_text: Während der Operationen auf dem Planeten bestätigte sich der Verdacht des gesegneten Lord Captain und {mf|seiner|ihrer} Gefährten: Die Rebellen wurden von noch schrecklicheren Feinden der Menschheit manipuliert. Als üble {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} identifizierte Kreaturen – Aeldari, um genau zu sein – wurden im Kampf an der Seite der Bauern gesichtet. Vistenza Vyatts sogenannte Gehilfin, die sich als Mutantin ausgegeben hatte, war nicht die Einzige ihrer Art auf Janus: Späher bestätigten die Präsenz weiterer Mitglieder dieser Spezies auf der Agrarwelt.

languages.text: Au cours des opérations sur la planète, les doutes {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} et de ses compagnons furent confirmés : les rebelles étaient bel et bien manipulés par des ennemis bien pires encore de l'humanité. Des créatures identifiées comme d'infâmes {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} — des Aeldaris, plus précisément — avaient été aperçus aux côtés des paysans lors des combats. La soi-disant aide de Vistenza Vyatt, qui avait prétendu être une mutante, n'était pas la seule de son espèce sur Janus : des éclaireurs confirmèrent la présence de plusieurs de ses semblables sur l'agri-monde.
languages.original_text: During the operations on the planet, the suspicions of the blessed Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} companions were confirmed: the rebels were being manipulated by even more terrible enemies of Humanity. Creatures identified as filthy {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} — Aeldari, to be precise — were seen fighting alongside the peasants. Vistenza Vyatt's so-called aide, who had claimed to be a mutant, was not the only one of her kind on Janus: scouts confirmed the presence of other members of this race on the agri-world.

traits.locale_text: Au cours des opérations sur la planète, les doutes {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} et de ses compagnons furent confirmés : les rebelles étaient bel et bien manipulés par des ennemis bien pires encore de l'humanité. Des créatures identifiées comme d'infâmes {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} — des Aeldaris, plus précisément — avaient été aperçus aux côtés des paysans lors des combats. La soi-disant aide de Vistenza Vyatt, qui avait prétendu être une mutante, n'était pas la seule de son espèce sur Janus : des éclaireurs confirmèrent la présence de plusieurs de ses semblables sur l'agri-monde.

languages.text: Gezegendeki operasyonlar sırasında yüce Lord Kaptan ve yoldaşlarının şüpheleri doğrulandı, isyancıları manipüle eden çok daha büyük bir İnsanlık düşmanı olduğu ortaya çıktı. Aeldari olarak tanımlanan kenef {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zenolar{/g}, köylülerin yanında savaşırken görülmüştü. Vistenza Vyatt'ın mutant olduğunu iddia eden sözde emir erinin, Janus'taki türünün tek örneği olmadığı öğrenildi. Keşif erleri, zirai dünyada bu ırktan daha başka kimselerin varlığını doğruladı.
languages.original_text: During the operations on the planet, the suspicions of the blessed Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} companions were confirmed: the rebels were being manipulated by even more terrible enemies of Humanity. Creatures identified as filthy {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} — Aeldari, to be precise — were seen fighting alongside the peasants. Vistenza Vyatt's so-called aide, who had claimed to be a mutant, was not the only one of her kind on Janus: scouts confirmed the presence of other members of this race on the agri-world.

traits.locale_text: Gezegendeki operasyonlar sırasında yüce Lord Kaptan ve yoldaşlarının şüpheleri doğrulandı, isyancıları manipüle eden çok daha büyük bir İnsanlık düşmanı olduğu ortaya çıktı. Aeldari olarak tanımlanan kenef {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zenolar{/g}, köylülerin yanında savaşırken görülmüştü. Vistenza Vyatt'ın mutant olduğunu iddia eden sözde emir erinin, Janus'taki türünün tek örneği olmadığı öğrenildi. Keşif erleri, zirai dünyada bu ırktan daha başka kimselerin varlığını doğruladı.
